title: Outlier Detection with Python
description: In this article, I will walk you through the task of outlier detection in machine learning. An outlier is a terminology commonly used by analysts and data scientists because it requires special attention, otherwise, it can lead to totally wrong estimates. Simply put, outlier detection is an observation that appears far away from and diverges from an overall pattern in a sample.Also, Read – Machine Learning Full Course for free.
